AbstractText.sentence: The nuclear factor of activated T cells (NFAT) group of transcription factors is retained in the cytoplasm of quiescent cells.

event.clue: The nuclear factor of activated T cells (NFAT) group of transcription factors is retained in the cytoplasm of quiescent cells.

AbstractText.sentence: NFAT activation is mediated in part by induced nuclear import.

AbstractText.sentence: This process requires calcium-dependent dephosphorylation of NFAT caused by the phosphatase calcineurin.

AbstractText.sentence: The c-Jun amino-terminal kinase (JNK) phosphorylates NFAT4 on two sites.

event.clue: The c-Jun amino-terminal kinase (JNK) phosphorylates NFAT4 on two sites.

AbstractText.sentence: Mutational removal of the JNK phosphorylation sites caused constitutive nuclear localization of NFAT4.
